title: bitfex.trade
author: bitfex.trade
content: Our crypto exchange (BitFex.trade) provides service to reissue your tokens.Your tokens have been stolen and you need to take them away from scammer holder? We can to reissue your tokens and change the balances to everyone except certain holders.Why is it convenient:- Simple. Holders don't need to be forced to withdraw funds to cold wallets from the exchange where your token is currently traded. They will only need to make a simple and familiar procedure for withdrawing tokens to a deposit wallet on our crypto exchange.- Quickly. After the deposit, the funds will be exchanged inside the exchange automatically, without the participation of the holder.- Safe. Holders will not be afraid for the safety of their coins, which they will send for exchange, since the exchange will be handled by an exchange with an excellent long-term reputation.- Profitable. Withdrawal of exchanged tokens without fee.TG: @bitfexE-mail: support@bitfex.trade
